survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee readiness and perceptions regarding the integration of AI tools in the workplace to enhance productivity and decision-making.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with AI tools currently used in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for familiarity levels to capture nuanced responses.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with AI tools currently used in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI tools have you used in your work? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify tool usage patterns.

script.question_text: Which of the following AI tools have you used in your work? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How has the use of AI tools impacted your productivity?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q2 is not 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced scale to measure both positive and negative impacts.

script.question_text: How has the use of AI tools impacted your productivity?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q2 is not 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: What concerns do you have about the integration of AI tools in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Include an option for no concerns to capture full sentiment.

script.question_text: What concerns do you have about the integration of AI tools in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Please describe any positive experiences you’ve had with AI tools in the workplace.
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q3 is 'Slightly increased' or 'Significantly increased'

script.question_text: Please describe any positive experiences you’ve had with AI tools in the workplace.
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q3 is 'Slightly increased' or 'Significantly increased'

questions.question_text: Please describe any negative experiences you’ve had with AI tools in the workplace.
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q3 is 'Slightly decreased' or 'Significantly decreased'

script.question_text: Please describe any negative experiences you’ve had with AI tools in the workplace.
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q3 is 'Slightly decreased' or 'Significantly decreased'

questions.question_text: How confident are you in your ability to learn and adapt to new AI tools?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to measure confidence levels.

script.question_text: How confident are you in your ability to learn and adapt to new AI tools?

questions.question_text: What type of training or support would help you better utilize AI tools? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: None, I don’t need additional support
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice to identify preferred learning methods.

script.question_text: What type of training or support would help you better utilize AI tools? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: None, I don’t need additional support

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the adoption of additional AI tools in your department?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to measure recommendation likelihood.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the adoption of additional AI tools in your department?

questions.question_text: What additional AI tools would you like to see implemented in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture specific tool requests.

script.question_text: What additional AI tools would you like to see implemented in your workplace?
